column4: Can anyone help me, I am trying to figure out why my wifi connection is so much slower on ubuntu compared to windows.
okay bobweaver it might take a while im on wifi right now, I can connect to a cord if i have to
but that is a year old
ok im trying to load the webpage, im about to go plug in my ethernet soon
this only pertains to wifi right? because when I hook it up via an ethernet cord it works fine
i click the link and all it does is bring me to a picture, i click the picture and it just brings me back to the redhate webpage.  Should i search for the file the link is refering to?
looks like alot of people have fixed with that
I have also been looking at this 3 page forum, do you believe this could fix it as well?  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1756096&page=2
chilli55 is a friend of mine and that is one smart dude when it comes to wireless
